title: Arrest Mark Zuckerberg for Child Endangerment
description: Should Mark Zuckerberg be handcuffed—literally—for the threat his products pose to millions of children? That’s the inescapable question raised by a legal brief filed last month in a civil case against major social media companies.The litigation, which allege…
content: The plaintiffs brief alleges that Meta was aware that its platforms were endangering young users, including by exacerbating adolescents mental health issues. According to the plaintiffs, Meta frequen… [+2541 chars]
